name: Hand of Midas
description: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

abilities.name: Transmute
abilities.description: Instantly kills the target non-hero unit, transmuting it into gold and experience. Sets the target's gold bounty to a fixed value, while multiplying the experience bounty.
notes: If cast on a neutral creep, also grants a few Madstone to the caster, and one to random allies
Cannot be cast on Roshan, Creep-heroes, Ancient Creeps, and Necronomicon Warriors
A newly acquired Hand of Midas starts with 1 charge
Upon cast, Transmute instantly kills the target unit, dealing 100% × CurrentHP damage to kill the targeted creep, triggering most on-damage events
This damage fully ignores any form of damage manipulation
Grants the caster 160 unreliable gold and 2.1 × XPBounty
The target's default bounties are not granted. This means that no hero nearby gains the default gold and experience from death
Despite the visual effects, the gold and experience are granted instantly
If targeting a Flagbearer Creep, the aura gold bounty is still granted

additionalInfo: View the Transmute Efficiency table for Transmute gold acquired based on the target it is used on
